text: Sexy Sam is an EP by American post-hardcore band Girls Against Boys, released on May 16, 1994 by Touch and Go Records. == Track listing == == Personnel == Adapted from the Sexy Sam liner notes. ; Girls Against Boys * Alexis Fleisig – drums * Eli Janney – sampler, bass guitar, backing vocals * Scott McCloud – lead vocals, guitar * Johnny Temple – bass guitar ;Production and additional personnel * John Loder – engineering * Ted Niceley – production ==Release history== {|class="wikitable" ! Region ! Date ! Label ! Format ! Catalog |- | United States | 1994 | Touch and Go | CD, LP | TG129 |} ==References== == External links == * Category:1994 EPs Category:Girls Against Boys albums Category:Touch and Go Records EPs Category:Albums produced by Ted Niceley
title: Sexy Sam
